2079450.name: Sad Ghouls Demo
2079450.description:
Sad Ghouls

is a singleplayer arcade survival shooter, where endless hordes of ghouls constantly stream into the arena.

Kill enemies to score points and increment the combo counter. Getting higher combo means better weapons and sometimes new weapons.

All score from kills gets multiplied by the combo counter. Choosing a higher difficulty setting results in tougher enemies that grant higher score. But a chill player can choose an easier difficulty to chill and still have a chance to appear on the leaderboard.

Customize

Select weapons, level and options that change the flow of the game.

Humble beginnings

Start small with weak weapons.

Level up

Kill ghouls to level up your weapons.

Obliterate the ghouls

Use powerful weapons to destroy the opposition.

Don't get overrun

No time to rest, enemies get stronger over time.

Global leaderboards

View leaderboards and compete with friends and strangers.

Top 10 players on the leaderboard get a chance for a wizard with their name to visit other players.

Special waves

Experience special frenzy, devil and wizard waves.

Gameplay features:

  • 8 different weapons

  • 3 differnet enemies

  • 4 different maps

  • 4 difficulties

  • Global leaderboards

  • 11+ steam achievements

  • and many more planned features....

Contributions can be found in the community hub.
2079450.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
